text: Pneumonia was defined as the presence of an acute infiltrate on a chest radiograph and at least one of the following : fever ( temperature $ 38 . 0uC ) or hypothermia ( temperature , 35 . 0uC ) , cough , pleuritic chest pain , dyspnea , and altered breath sounds on auscultation [ 15 ] . Pneumonia was categorized as communityacquired pneumonia ( CAP ) , healthcare - associated pneumonia ( HCAP ) , or hospital - acquired pneumonia ( HAP ) , as defined previously [ 16 , 17 ] .
